author: kingpanther13
releaseNotes:
v0.3.0 - Major feature release: Rule portability, new action types, conditional triggers, and reliability improvements.

NEW FEATURES:
- Rule export/import/clone: export_rule exports rules as portable JSON with device manifest; import_rule imports with optional device ID remapping; clone_rule duplicates existing rules (disabled by default)
- Conditional triggers: Per-trigger condition gates â€” individual triggers only fire when their inline condition is met
- 8 new action types: set_thermostat (mode/setpoints/fan), http_request (GET/POST), speak (TTS with optional volume), comment (documentation-only no-op), set_valve (open/close), set_fan_speed, set_shade (open/close/position), variable_math (arithmetic on local/global variables)
- Variable math: add, subtract, multiply, divide, modulo, set operations on local or global variables
- String substitution in actions: %device%, %value%, %name%, %time%, %date%, %now%, %mode%, and variable references
- Version update check: Automatic daily check against GitHub with UI banner and check_for_update MCP tool
- Sunrise/sunset trigger normalization: Accepts 6+ input formats and auto-normalizes to canonical form

RELIABILITY:
- Debug logging overhaul: 45+ silent failure points now route through MCP debug log system
- Child app ruleLog() bridge to parent mcpLog() with fallback to standard logging

34 MCP tools total (up from 30).
